subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy, a teenager from Northern Ireland playing only his sixth professional tournament, was among the Australian Masters leaders.McIlroy, who finished as low amateur at this year’s British Open, shot a two-under-par 70 on the Huntingdale course in Melbourne. He made birdies on Nos. 5, 6 and 7 and was three strokes behind the leader, Robert Allenby.
